overview: A tough Russian policeman is forced to partner up with a cocky Chicago police detective when he is sent to Chicago to apprehend a Georgian drug lord who killed his partner and fled the country.
tagline: Moscow's toughest detective. Chicago's craziest cop. There's only one thing worse than making them mad. Making them partners.
cast: Arnold Schwarzenegger|Jim Belushi|Peter Boyle|Ed O'Ross|Laurence Fishburne
